text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump WHO #Coronavirus special envoy, Dr David Nabarro says 'we don't want anyone to believe there is a vaccine round the corner' and adds "the virus will be a constant threat".

#COVID_19
#TrumpGenocide
